turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey assistant! I need to get a couple of pizzas from Si-Pie.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Si-Pie are you referring to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think the one on Belmont is their only store. But either way, that's the one I want.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are you picking the pizzas up now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes as soon as they can be ready. I have friends coming over and my dinner didn't turn out so well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I had better get three large pizzas just in case.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On one of them I would just like double pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And on the other two?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On one of them, canadian bacon and pineapple. And on the other tomato and green pepper.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I am looking at their menu and they do not have Canadian bacon. Do you just want pinepple on that one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: See if they have ham.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, ham is available.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, so make that one ham and pineapple.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any appetizers to go with it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh good thinking. Yes, get some garlic bread and mozarella sticks. Extra marinara with those please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so I am ordering three pizzas from Si-Pie for immediate pickup. One with double pepperoni, one with ham and pineapple, and one with tomato and green pepper. Also one order of garlic bread and one order of mozarella sticks, both with extra marinara sauce.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that is perfect!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How would you like to pay for this order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I have an account with them under my name.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, the order will be ready in 25 minutes, that is 8:33 pm. It is under your name. Is there anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you assistant!
